original_text: Then Jesus said to the Pharisees, ‘God wanted to help people. So he made a day for them when they should rest. He did not make people so that they could keep laws about the day of rest.
korean_text: 또 이르시되 안식일이 사람을 위하여 있는 것이요 사람이 안식일을 위하여 있는 것이 아니니

sentences.original_text: Then Jesus said to the Pharisees
So he made a day for them
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그는 그들을 위해 날을 만드셨다

sentences.original_text: so that they could keep laws
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 법을 지키도록 하기 위함이 아니었다
